text:
Abuse and Goodbye. Listen to the new songs of Zemfira

03 Nov 2019, 08:12

Singer Zemfira in Dubai during a concert at the Parus festival performed two new songs. The tracks called Abuse and Goodbye were posted by the Inner Emigrant YouTube channel, which, according to Medusa‚Äôs information, belongs to the editor-in-chief of Your Leisure website.
A song called Abuse, as you can see from the title, is about domestic violence. ‚ÄúI invite you to my own hell tomorrow,‚Äù the lyrical heroine says. There are complaints in the text: ‚ÄúYou do not love me. Not yesterday, not now, "" Just hold me tight ... on such a leash that it‚Äôs impossible to breathe. " In the chorus, the English word abuse is pronounced several times, which, when repeated, turns into the Russian ‚Äúscore‚Äù.



The Goodbye song is about two heroes who "promised to save each other and could not." In the chorus Zemfira sings:
Goodbye, I‚Äôll still love, To fool you, Only now you know - goodbye. Fly in the direction of the world, Where is your place, And I need to stay in Dubai.



‚ÄúFor a long time Zemfira was not heard, and here is a new song, cheers. The case when the word abyuz sounds beautiful, ‚Äùusers comment. ‚ÄúWords are just to the point!‚Äù Writes another fan. And some fans even found reason to compare the work with the movie "The Joker" by Todd Phillips: "It's like a Joker üÉèü§™üòú All the new songs of this year have other bits üôâüôäüôà."
Recall that Zemfira's previous track on Brodsky‚Äôs text was released on September 3, 2018. Earlier, the singer stated that she was going to abandon concerts in order to write a new album.
Fontanka.ru
